column5: Historic house with early German Texas architecture of hand cut limestone. Gracious front porch has hill country views. Biergarten patio for outdoor living. Original fireplace, hardwood floors. Elegant floor-to-ceiling windows let in lots of light. Cable and wifi. Kitchen has modern appliances, farmhouse sink, pass-through to living room. Expandable kitchen table seats 6, breakfast bar seats 3. Coffee, sugar, filters provided. Open shower with rainfall shower head, towel warmer, fluffy robes.
column8: Country Cottage, relax on patio in hill country
